biolockj.module.classifier.wgs

Class MetaphlanClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.module.BioModuleImpl
      • biolockj.module.ScriptModuleImpl
        • biolockj.module.classifier.ClassifierModuleImpl
          • biolockj.module.classifier.wgs.MetaphlanClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BioModule, ClassifierModule, ScriptModule

    public class MetaphlanClassifier
extends ClassifierModuleImpl
implements ClassifierModule
    This BioModule builds the bash scripts used to execute metaphlan2.py to classify WGS sequences.

    • Method Detail

      • buildScript

        public List<List<String>> buildScript(List<File> files)
                               throws Exception
        Build bash script lines to classify unpaired WGS reads with Metaphlan. The inner list contains 1 bash script line per sample.

        Example line:
        python /app/metaphlan2.py --nproc 8 -t rel_ab_w_read_stats --input_type fasta ./input/sample42.fasta --bowtie2out ./temp/sample42.bowtie2.bz2 > ./output/sample42_reported.tsv

        Specified by:
        buildScript in interface ScriptModule
        Specified by:
        buildScript in class ScriptModuleImpl
        Parameters:
        files - Files in the input directory that contain only forward reads
        Returns:
        Nested list of bash scripts lines
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to generate script lines

      • buildScriptForPairedReads

        public List<List<String>> buildScriptForPairedReads(List<File> files)
                                             throws Exception
        Build bash script lines to classify paired WGS reads with Metaphlan. The inner list contains 1 bash script line per sample.

        Example line:
        python /app/metaphlan2.py --nproc 8 -t rel_ab_w_read_stats --input_type fasta ./input/sample42_R1.fasta, ./input/sample42_R2.fasta --bowtie2out ./temp/sample42.bowtie2.bz2 > ./output/sample42_reported.tsv

        Specified by:
        buildScriptForPairedReads in interface ScriptModule
        Overrides:
        buildScriptForPairedReads in class ScriptModuleImpl
        Parameters:
        files - Files in the input directory that contain only paired reads
        Returns:
        Nested list of bash scripts lines
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to generate the script lines

        public void checkDependencies()
                       throws Exception
        Verify none of the derived command line parameters are included in Config."exe.classifierParams"
        Specified by:

        Overrides:

        Throws:

        public List<String> getWorkerScriptFunctions()
                                      throws Exception
